text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I'm eating lunch in the cafeteria, I<n>catch sight of Mejiro
McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ugh... this is nowhere near enough...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: No, stay strong! You must stick to the<n>plan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's still being too strict about what<n>she eats. I wish I
could be of some<n>help...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Not sure what Miss Prim-and-Proper<n>over there's tryna
prove. I just know<n>that all she can think about is wolfing<n>
down a bunch of those cakes she<n>loves.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh, did'ja hear that? Suppose you<n>would, bein' right there
and all.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Anyways, yeah! She loves sweets<n>just as much as I love
justice and<n>liberty!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I thought her reign of terror over the<n>strawberry-flavored
realm would<n>resume after the tryout race, but I<n>guess not.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh, speaking of reigns of terror, it<n>sounds like the denizens
of Planet<n>Thirteen require my strength. See ya<n>nara!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I think she just gave me a valuable<n>hint.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I return to my room and spend the<n>rest of the day
researching meal<n>plans.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh... There you are again.
choice_data_list: Could I get you to take a look at this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: At... your notebook?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: All right, I'll take a look.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
A meal plan... There are so many<n>options that shouldn't
cause much<n>weight gain... Did you really put this<n>together
just for me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And it looks like... I can eat certain<n>sweets?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sweets are on the menu?! Are they<n>really okay to eat?!
choice_data_list:
They'll give you more energy to run with all
your might!

They'll give you more energy to run with all
your might!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. To think that<n>you'd do so much for
my sake, even<n>before scouting me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Would you mind if I borrowed this<n>notebook for a while?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh... One more thing. Would you mind<n>coming to watch me
train next week?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Excellent. I look forward to meeting<n>you then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One week later, I come out to the<n>course as promised.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I hope you've had a productive<n>week, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now then, I'll begin running. Please<n>watch.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I observe her training carefully.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'm feeling light as a feather!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Each of her strides are powerful and<n>confident. The
difference in her run is<n>like night and day!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: What did you think?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'm honored to hear you say<n>that!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I can finally exert my full<n>strength thanks to that
meal plan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
When it came to my diet, I thought<n>that trying to eat less
was the only<n>way to go.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Your meal plan had more nutritients<n>despite lower caloric
intake, meaning I<n>could afford to eat more.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To think that sweets could even be<n>factored in... Hehe, I'm
feeling so<n>much better now!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In any case... I believe I've finally<n>shown you exactly what I
am capable<n>of.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you. So allow me to introduce<n>myself once more...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I am a member of the Mejiro family.<n>My name obliges me
to run with the<n>utmost of grace, splendor, and<n>perfection.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If you are to insist on being my<n>trainer, then you should also
be<n>prepared to call yourself a Mejiro<n>Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
What do you say? Are you prepared<n>to shoulder the
responsibility that<n>would entail?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I can certainly hear the<n>confidence in your voice!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. Now then,<n>Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
With your guidance and<n>encouragement, I'm looking
forward<n>to working together.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And with that, my days as Mejiro<n>McQueen's trainer begin.
